#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int a[2000],sum,dp[2000][2000];
inline int Scan_f()
{
    register int noRead=0;
    register char p=getchar_unlocked();
    //register char p=getc(stdin);
    for(;p<48 || p>57;p=getchar_unlocked());
    //for(;p<48 || p>57;p=getc(stdin));
    while(p>47 && p<58){ noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');p=getchar_unlocked();}
    //while(p>47 && p<58){ noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');p=getc(stdin);}
    return noRead;
}; 
  
int main()
{
    int T,i,j,flag,n,k;
    T = Scan_f();
    while(T>0)
   {         
    n = Scan_f();
    sum = Scan_f();
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
	 a[i] = Scan_f();;				
	}
	for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
	 dp[0][i] = 1;
	for(i=1;i<=sum;i++)
	{
	 for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
	 {
	  dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-1];
	  if(i >= a[j-1])
	  dp[i][j] = dp[i][j]|dp[i-a[j-1]][j-1];
     }
    }
    if(dp[sum][n])
     cout << 1 << endl;
	else
	 cout<< 0<<endl;   
    T--;
   } 
    return 0;
}
